message:
Hello everyone! To enhance security, we've created a website where you can create an account on our Firebase server. This account will be used to log in to our future extensions. You'll need an account to use any of our upcoming extensions/Tools.
To create your account, open the website, enter your email address, create a new password, confirm it, and click "Create Account. " Your account will be created within seconds.
Link: https://ayush-site.vercel.app/create-account.html
Note: All data will be stored on Firebase servers. We cannot see your password, but we may check your email for security purposes. We reserve the right to delete or ban your account if necessary.
